entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WildcardPathSegment does not properly honor provided StringComparison #68942
  • System.IO.FileStream.Lock ApiCompat issues #68939
  • [API Proposal]: Remove setter of Capacity Property in the BoundedChannelOptions class #68936
  • LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests fail in all PR #68932
  • Addressing security vulnerability in System.Text.Json 4.X version #68931
  • AggregateException.ToString() should not duplicate inner message exception #68930
  • [debugger] CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA error when inspecting EF Core classes in .Net 6 #68929
  • Mono work necessary to support IL-based invoke #68928
    7.0.0
  • fx_ver::parse SIGABRTs on Mac with new toolset update #68927
    7.0.0
  • Extend System.Runtime.InteropServices.CLong and CULong to match nfloat #68926
    7.0.0
  • Consider hiding stack frames when using Invoke #68923
    7.0.0
  • Update `INS_serialize` perfscore with accurate numbers. #68917
    7.0.0
  • Add `X86Serialize` API and intrinsic for mono. #68916
  • AOT+LLVM throws for `Enum.GetUnderlyingType()` on Android in .NET 7 #68914
  • X509Certificates failures in outer loop on CentOS 9 #68911
  • Switch expression in C# 8 behaves differently on x86 vs x64 android #68906
    7.0.0
  • Mono JIT: Wrong stack size calculation of basic blocks #68905
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicConnection #68902
  • Cache-Control parsing differs from other headers #68901
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_File #68915
  • [Android][iOS] Enable HttpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator when using native handlers #68898
  • [API Proposal]: Add property to ZipArchiveEntry to indicate if the entry is encrypted #68897
    7.0.0
  • dotnet watch Console.ReadLine() does not read first key stroke #68909
  • System.Text.Json does not fill JsonExtensionData when a property with the same name already exists or has the JsonIgnoreAttribute #68895
  • [NativeAOT] SemaphoreSlim.ReleaseWaitAsync benchmarks are slower on Windows #68894
  • CertGetCertificateChain memory leak in pure Windows 7 system #68892
  • [NativeAOT] ConcurrentDictionary is slower #68891
  • JIT does not inline operators against generic math #68890
  • [NativeAOT] Not using ICU on Windows by default #68889
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/tailcall_v4/hijacking/hijacking.cmd #68884
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\NETClients\\Primitives\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC.cmd #68880

Closed

  • FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath does not return a fully qualified path #62606
    7.0.0
  • macOS / Mac Catalyst / iOS: CurrentThread.Current[UI]Culture is always the invariant culture #68321
    6.0.x
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA1 test failure #68590
  • CI: wasm.build.tests.satelliteassembliestests.resourcesfrommainassembly CI failure on Linux #68773
  • Assert failure: `!pFlat->HasReadyToRunHeader()` #68654
    7.0.0
  • SetYieldProcessorScalingFactor needs to change to adapt to the new periodical measurements #68839
    7.0.0
  • runtime-extra-platforms rolling build failure: Docker Internal Server Error - The container operating system does not match the host operating system. #67728
  • Downlevel (out-of-band nuget) version of System.Memory / ReadOnlySequence<T> doesn't work correctly with custom memory-managers #67295
  • Running dotnet test in libraries failing to execute net462 targets #68384
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\huge\\huge_i4_il_r\\huge_i4_il_r.cmd #65819
    7.0.0
  • FileStream.Lock(Int64, Int64) always fails on FreeBSD #65831
    7.0.0
  • Tiered Compilation turns a static readonly value into a constant, ignoring changes made to the value via generated IL #68912
  • Building .NET 6 Blazor WebAssembly applications with .NET 7 SDK leads to errors and warnings #68896
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_ExactVersion_Success(uri: \"https://www.litespeedtech.com/\") #68692
    7.0.0
  • Support for HTTPS proxy #68416
    7.0.0
  • MutualTLS authentication in C# for httpclient #68070
  • [Mono] Clean up the function calls #66525
    7.0.0
  • Multiple calls of QuicConnection.CloseAsync lead to Debug.Assert #56851
    7.0.0
  • Susessful Build #68903
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-allocating overload of JsonEncodedText.Encode that allows the caller to own the memory #68747
  • [API Proposal]: AssemblyLoadContext.MixedAssemblyLoadContextFactory #62754
  • [QUIC] IPv6 addresses don't work on Linux #67301
  • System.Text.Json source generator crashes when processing unresolved symbols #68072
    7.0.0
  • Test failrue JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\Desktop\\boxunboxvaluetype_ro\\boxunboxvaluetype_ro.cmd #68882
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException using SpanDebugView #56703
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Move APIs for generated marshalling to different namespace - System.Runtime.Marshalling #68248
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking(options: NonBacktracking) #60753
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ProfileOptimization test #68943
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update ApiCompat to exclude UnsupportedOSPlatform["freebsd"] on Lock/Unlock #68941
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop" #68940
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix double-validation in BoundedChannelOptions #68938
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Call simpler overloads of Substring and Slice #68937
    area-Meta
  • Fix System.Collections.Immutable version in ILCompiler.Build.Tasks #68935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68934
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink/ActivityEvent: Implement EnumerateTagObjects API #68933
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68925
    area-Meta
  • Reenable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs #68922
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reenable `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #68921
    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • Enable dumping of R2R manifest metadata from ildasm #68920
    area-ILTools-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • PoC: retire internal SocketExceptionFactory #68918
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [MONO][TEST] Disabled k-nucleotide test on mono #68910
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Experimental - add system.runtime tests to aot #68904
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update libunwind to latest #68899
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename CoreRT to NativeAOT (1/N) #68888
    area-Meta
  • Add Mac ARM64 coverage to runtime-dev-innerloop #68886
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs FullPath/OldFullPath changes #68883
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68265
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.6
  • Use more char.Is helpers from RegexCompiler / source generator #68924
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Do not fold relocatable constants into displacements #68851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VSTest and dotnet test broken on .NETFramework #68863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix for FileStream.Lock(Int64, Int64) always fails on FreeBSD #65831 #68908
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Unloadability bugs fixes #68674
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fixed the yp_spin_count_unit to be a factor of the original_spin_count_unit rather than a continually increasing value #68881
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Tweak Regex comparison to improve subsequent bounds check removals #68846
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few more API compat inconsistencies #68834
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add test for multiple calls of QuicConnection.CloseAsync #68893
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1753679 #68870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use Docker images from mcr.microsoft.com in EnterpriseTests #68875
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Replace invalid sourcegen debug assertion with runtime check #68828
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fixed the yp_spin_count_unit to be a factor of the original_spin_count_unit rather than a continually increasing value #68879
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improving the 64-bit number formatting to better match the 32-bit algorithm #68795
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update message for unsupported char marshalling #68865
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add a four-element AsyncLocalValueMap type #68790
    area-System.Threading, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes on Apple OSs #68867
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Stop escaping ' and " in generated regex XML comments #68856
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Move `CustomTypeMarshaller` APIs to `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling` #68842
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Delete stale IgnoreCaseRelation regex tests #68857
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • [WIP] GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Deprecate ICU ucol_safeClone and support ucol_clone #68847
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Throw from MsQuicImplementationProvider if not supported. #68833
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Apply changes from #63356 #68864
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to automate nativeaot compiler targeted for x64 using 32bit vs command prompt #1766
  • NativeAOT compiler fails from VS command prompt #1674

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Way to unload a Managed assembly from native library using hostfxr #25230
  • A multitargeting project that references 2 projects with the same name under 2 different TFMs fails to compile #25224
  • What is the intended way to target a specific version of the .NET Runtime? #25220

Closed

  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 6.0. Either target .NET 5.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 6.0. ConsoleEF C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\5.0.407\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk\targets\Microsoft.NET.TargetFrameworkInference.targets 141 #25218

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the ImplicitUsings feature minimally define each imported namespace #25225
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Next two test projects to move to helix #25197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25130
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update build.yml to target loc build at 6.0.4xx #25195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25181
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05

Issues

Closed

Updated

PullRequests

Merged

  • fix links to ECMA standard #6097

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong overload resolution between `Action` and `Func<Task>` when passing a delegate with an endless loop. #61156
  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #61154
  • Building Roslyn docs mentions VS option that doesn't exist #61145
  • Incorrect name ambiguity with discard lambda parameters #61143
  • Workspace.Dispose throwing on shutdown trying to instantiate MEF components during the MEF container disposable #61140

Closed

  • Visual Studio freezes even more when bulk undoing hundreds or more actions #61063
  • Replace method with property refactoring discards trivia #40758
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 intellisense "is" operator not suggesting enum values #38997
    Backlog
  • Convert to conditional expression refactoring introduces incorrect cast to non-nullable type #40244
    Backlog
  • `fixed` keyword isn't recommended inside an unsafe local function #52296
    Backlog
  • Add an option to collapse using section automatically #44843
    17.3
  • Relax file collapsing on navigation for Source Link #60049
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Feedback about ASP.Net ExternalAccess PR #61152
    Area-IDE
  • Update light bulb workarounds to apply through 17.2 Preview 6 #61151
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Reuse workspace solutions for requests when LSP contents match #61139
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude more duplicate files we ship in Core folder #61153
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61155
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Take trivia from old method references when replacing them with generated property references #61150
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support utf8 strings in the virtual char service #61149
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Hard select item from default source when filter text is empty #61121
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve performance of SourceText.IsBinary on .NET Core #61148
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Implement suggested refactorings #61135
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Adjust tests to ensure abstract statics are not supported in C#10. #61133
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Suggest `fixed` keyword in unsafe local functions #61146
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Revert to pass isBlocking as a parameter #61123
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • assert property is override when reporting `ERR_AutoPropertyMustOverrideSet` #61125
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move OIDC PKCE state #41548
  • Make it possible for me to opt out of ThrowIfRecordTypeHasValidationOnProperties or ignore if attribute IS present on params #41546
  • Support binding request body as Stream in Controller Actions #41540
    .NET 7 Planning
  • my token is always null in app Blazor server Net 6 VS 2022 #41539
  • Add ability to register IHubContext<T> service in DI #41538
  • Potential memory leak with Blazor Webassembly when using an iframe in a razor component #41537
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41532
  • Duplicate registration in ServicesCollection on AspNetCore. #41530
  • With "Do not use top-level statements" checked, in Blazor WebAssembly App/ Blazor Server App/gRPC, the namespace is "Company.WebApplication1" rather than the solution name. #41529
    6.0.x
  • Blazor, OnTimeUpdate and similar events: make argument more specific and clear #41528
  • Perf regression: https, json #41527
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #41526
  • Add structured header parser #41524
  • The type or namespace 'Internal' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.AspnetCore.Http'. Are you missing an assembly reference? #41522

Closed

  • EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream doesn't support 0-byte reads #41287
    6.0.6
  • Http.Sys request body does not support 0-byte reads #41305
    6.0.6
  • SNI configuration doesn't allow multiple hostnames of same length #41216
    6.0.6
  • Question: In Blazor Wasm, is it possible to capture the generated html from a Blazor component? #41508
  • Blazor Server Windows Authentication : Trust Relationship between this workstation and the primary domain failed. #41512
  • Undo workarounds added to dockerfile while updating to 7.0 SDK #37406
  • .Net 5 to .Net 6 migration breaking integration tests in docker, works ok in local #41509
  • Abort gracefully closes the response rather than aborting it #31404
    6.0.x
  • StaticWebAssets.xml not found when using SDK 6.0.100 and targeting NET5 #38726
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet watch hangs while a Time Machine backup is being run on macOS Monterey #41257
    Backlog
  • MultipartReader.ReadNextSectionAsync() causes error "Unexpected end of Stream" #41313
  • Blazor navigation not work properly on Safari iOS latest #41390
  • Create new Web API using `dotnet new webapi` with use-minimal-apis and use-program-main options set, you get a warning on build #41491
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Port template test fixes from release/6.0 #41549
    area-mvc
  • Use 1es-windows-2019 again #41547
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix description for MultipartReader.BodyLengthLimit #41479 #41543
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implemented test to monitor issue 4754 #41542
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Fix failing test on machine using en-GB #41534
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Pass through CancellationToken #41531
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update Grpc.Core.Api version to 2.45.0 and support write cancellation #41525
    area-grpc
  • Add support for HttpBody to gRPC JSON transcoding #41523
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Update SPA template JS dependencies #41514
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Try new docker image #41194
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41492
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.6
  • Remove release/5.0 Dependabot config #41541
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41500
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41462
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Give `$(DotnetEfVersion)` readable casing #41484
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry.IsPassword several bugs on Windows (value from binding is not set, IsPassword cannot be changed without reseting value if from value came from binding instead of user input #6870
  • [iOS] Cannot Debug #6869
  • [Windows] BoolToVisibilityConverter returns the incorrect type #6868
  • Can't start Blazor MAUI project rc2 #6867
  • Maui NET ios app error when trying to create ipa file #6866
  • SQL Server pre-login handshake failed Android 5,6,8.1 #6859
    6.0.300-servicing
  • VisualStateGroupList set from a Style aren't unapplied when the Style is unapplied #6857
    6.0.300
  • Properties set from a Setter in a VSGL in a Style have the wrong priority #6856
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems are disappearing when navigating back from an another page #6855
  • IndicatorView for CarouselView does not work #6854
    6.0.300
  • MauiIcon ForegroundScale does not work (does not scale icon under Android) #6850
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Inconsistent result on Binding change by DataTrigger #6849
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MacOS - CollectionView with grouping + GridItemsLayout does not load. #6848
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] DataTrigger not applied when null at initial #6847
  • Picker Title displays above the control on Windows #6845
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Get native Window handle from control #6843
  • Reopen issue #4593. VS 17.2 prv6. Error NETSDK1130 Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.winmd cannot be referenced. Referencing a Windows Metadata component directly when targeting .NET 5 or higher is not supported. For more information, see https://aka.ms/netsdk1130 #6842
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Disabled CheckBox on iOS always Tints Grey #6839

Closed

  • CarouselView crashes with Loop="True" #6521
    6.0.300
  • App crashes when changing CarouselView Loop property at runtime #6457
    6.0.300
  • CarouselView Position property not updating after changing ItemsSource #6328
    6.0.300
  • C# Hot Reload Broken in VS 2022 17.2.0 Preview 3 #4989
    6.0.300
  • Android.Webkit namespace is not found and project does not compile when classes are in Platform/Android directory #6610
    6.0.300
  • Maui RC1 - "System.NotSupportedException: Must call AddTerm AddSeparator in that order" #6489
    6.0.300
  • Adding an image file to Resources/Images folder gets incorrectly set as AndroidResource Build Action #6418
    6.0.300
  • Blazor MAUI - Clipboard Android - NotAllowedError: Write permission denied #6846
  • Loading native iOS library #6830
  • [Android] SwipeItem Unexpectedly Turns IconImageSource Into Only A Cutout When Setting BackgroundColor #6825
    6.0.300-servicing
  • If Listview IsEnabled is false, items are still enabled #6581
    6.0.300
  • iOS Checkbox is causing an infinite loop #6687
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView Crash on Android... RequestBuilder Error #6518
    6.0.300
  • Remove preview branding form the templates for GA #6617
    6.0.300
  • Border Rendered Incorrectly While giving Corner Radius in some cases #6805
    6.0.300
  • The SearchHandler is not rendered on Windows #6036
    6.0.300
  • Please have a look at #4397 for instructions on how to build/archive and let us know there if things still aren't working. Thanks! #6865
  • Shell.FlyoutBehavior="Locked" shows empy menu on Andriod #6701
    6.0.300
  • Publish MAUI Project with project reference To Class library produces errors. #6717
    6.0.300
  • Multi-targeting frameworks in Maui does not work #5833
    6.0.300-servicing
  • How to change CornerRadius dynamically? #6646
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #6831
  • With UseMaui = true in class library I get a '"CopyLocalFilesOutputGroup" does not exist' error #6529
    6.0.300
  • Rendering after IsVisible flip is messed up #6069
    6.0.300
  • Some control styling doesn't reflect UserAppTheme #6006
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Core and Controls.Core #6874
    area/docs 📓
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7

  • Bump xunit.runner.visualstudio from 2.4.3 to 2.4.4 #6861
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump _SkiaSharpVersion from 2.88.0-preview.256 to 2.88.0-preview.261 #6860
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Core] Fix crash in DeviceStateTrigger #6853
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, fatal, 6.0.300

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecate migrations data seeding #27959
  • Add TPCTableSplittingTests #27958
  • TPC: Remove unnecessary union tables #27957
  • Error generating migration with 2 FKs to the same entity #27956
  • Does EFCore 6 supports table valued parameters of table valued functions? #27955
  • Function StoreType is ignored for DateTime #27954
  • Query Translation: difference between x.Count()==0 and !x.Any() #27953
  • EF Core returns null for some navigation properties #27952
  • Have a way to query a particular entity type only in hierarchy #27951

Closed

  • Use client value comparer as provider value comparer if possible #27850
    7.0.0
  • GetProperty should return null if not found; instead it throws an exception #27791
    7.0.0
  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27738
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion #27942
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and SQLitePCLRaw #27932
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    6.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.8 to 8.0.10 #27929
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
  • [6.0.x] Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27852
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6
